round_best: Develop a novel dual-pathway diffusion model specifically designed for high-resolution image segmentation. The model consists of a high-resolution pathway focusing on meticulous texture and edge delineation, and a context-aware pathway that embodies broader scene understanding. This integrated approach would utilize complementary losses—such as feature-map level perceptual loss for the high-resolution pathway and semantic segmentation loss for the context pathway—to reinforce model learning, ensuring that both pathways collaboratively enhance the accuracy and definition of fine-grained segmentation outputs.
